about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of “KUBI ZUKA (Tomb of Heads)"

A ‘KUBI ZUKA’ is a place where the heads of those who have died in battle or criminals are enshrined.

In this ancient village, shrouded in an eerie silence, you will take on the challenge of unraveling the mystery of the ‘KUBI ZUKA’, where fear and mystery swirl together.

Features of this game

In this Japanese-style horror game, you will step into a cursed land that has been around since the Warring States period, and explore an abandoned village where vengeful spirits and ghosts wander around. On your journey, you will encounter the ghost of a samurai who has risen from the grave, and various other strange apparitions that will draw you into a world of terror.

  • Japanese world view: The setting is a traditional Japanese landscape that has fallen into disrepair over time, including old private houses, graveyards, and approach roads

  • Inescapable fear: A thrilling game where you have no weapons or means of fighting back, and you have to hide and run away

  • Collecting elements: Collect items such as old talismans and cursed scrolls hidden in the village, and find a way to appease the spirits

  • Fear caused by strange phenomena: Encounter ghosts, will-o'-the-wisps and other strange phenomena, and experience unknown fear

KUBI ZUKA is a work that not only allows you to experience fear, but also to come into contact with the sorrow and grudges of ghosts in a beautiful yet eerie Japanese world.

Set out on a journey to uncover the secrets that lie buried here and to clear away the regrets.

This game was developed by a single artist who poured his passion into it.

His unique aesthetic and world of horror await you.

content_descriptors.notes: This video game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.
